Posts.Content: Apr 25, 2007 10:58AM Misty0418 wrote: Thank you Dawn, everything went really well this morning. My doctor was very nice about it. She examined me, felt the lump and then suggested to me that I have a biopsy done. I thought I was going to have to beg and plead, but it was nice to hear that I am not crazy for not wanting to just rely on the mamm. and u/s. I have an appt. with the surgeon on May 22nd. When do you have your biopsy done?

Posts.Title: Need help with results, please Misty0418 Liz81

Posts.Content: Misty0418 wrote: Hi everyone! I posted the other day about not being able to get the results to my diagnostic mammogram and ultrasound. Today, the doctor's office called and said both were normal. I said "that's great, but I still have this lump, does the ultrasound say anything about a cyst"? She said the mammogram says that I have a "benign calcification in the right breast". Which is the breast that I feel the lump in. The report said also that if it continues to bother me that I should be sent for an MRI. I told her that I wanted to make an appt. to speak to my doctor about getting the MRI, because I don't like the fact that I have this lump and it is not proven to be a cyst. Am I being too paranoid, should I just let things rest with these normal findings or am I doing the right thing in asking for an MRI, just in case? Please give me your opinions I value them so much. Thank You all! Misty Lump in breast found 4/07 Mammogram and US 4/11 Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Need help with results, please Misty0418 Liz81
